thread.title: BRIEF-Erin Energy Says Floating Production Storage & Offloading Vessel Had Emergency Shutdown, Which Resulted In Shut-In Of Oyo-8 Well

title: BRIEF-Erin Energy Says Floating Production Storage & Offloading Vessel Had Emergency Shutdown, Which Resulted In Shut-In Of Oyo-8 Well

organizations.name: brief-erin energy says floating production storage & offloading vessel

text:
Market News April 19, 2018 / 8:22 PM / Updated 3 minutes ago BRIEF-Erin Energy Says Floating Production Storage & Offloading Vessel Had Emergency Shutdown, Which Resulted In Shut-In Of Oyo-8 Well Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 19 (Reuters) - Erin Energy Corp: 
* ERIN ENERGY SAYS FLOATING PRODUCTION STORAGE & OFFLOADING VESSEL HAD EMERGENCY SHUTDOWN, WHICH RESULTED IN SHUT-IN OF OYO-8 WELL - SEC FILING 
* ERIN - DUE TO NON-RELEASE OF NOMINATED MARINE TANKER FOR CRUDE OIL OFFTAKE BY NIGERIAN AUTHORITY, Q1 CRUDE OIL LIFTING SCHEDULED FOR MARCH-END DELAYED 
* ERIN ENERGY - SUSPENDED OYO FIELD PRODUCTION OPERATIONS INCLUDING FPSO Source text: ( bit.ly/2HKpLQl ) Further company coverage:
